evidence.claim: The company uses AWS and GCP for cloud services.
LyfeHealth implements HIPAA-compliant protocols and standards in their services.
They focus on API integration for EHRs and health data interoperability through FHIR and X12 standards.
LyfeHealth utilizes data streaming technologies for real-time healthcare data processing.

icp.icp_reason: No public information confirming use of X12 or relevant healthcare data exchange.
